overview:
Rebecca Meissner is the Founder and Managing Partner of Industry Talent Group (ITG) and a Principal Partner Lead at Jobvite where she managed their analytics platform and thrid party partnerships. Most recently, Rebecca was the Director of Product for BranchOut, the largest professional network on Facebook. There she conceptualized and developed the largest recruiting enterprise solution on the platform, RecruiterConnect. Prior to BranchOut, Rebecca was a Product Manager for Disney Interactive Media Group, an HR Business Partner for Playdom, and an Associate for Glocap Search, a boutique financial services recruiting firm in San Francisco. In addition to her work at ITG, Rebecca works as a product leader for social enterprise companies in the valley and is a mentor at 500 Startups, a prestigious incubator for seed stage companies across the country.

Rebecca holds her BA from the University of California â€“ Berkeley.
